ygData.subject: RE: New goodies from Kedge Keep and other places ****SP OILER****
ygData.msgSnippet: it s not live yet.  the entrance is in the 3rd gate of Neriak, or a high level wizard has a group gate there.  got this info from someone who battle-tested it
ygData.messageBody:
it's not live yet. the entrance is in the 3rd gate of Neriak, or a high
level wizard has a group gate there. got this info from someone who
battle-tested it on the test server.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, L24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, L24 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L20 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

> BTW : I couldn't help but notice that the latest patch
> included some files
> for the Plane of Hate. Does anyone know if this has gone
> "live"? Has the
> entrance been found?
>
> Desmei Sightblinder
> Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]\
